website_summaries.verdict: Customers seeking a remarkably hydrating bubble mask should look into this highly rated option.
pros: Lid dispenser makes for simpler application
Vegan product with a cruelty-free formula
Users appreciated the ultra-clean feel of skin after use
cons: Mask does more for combination or oily skin than dry skin

customer_reviews.title: Leaves your skin feeling clean!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I ordered this from Amazon, fast delivery and you can't beat the deal. It goes on clear and starts to bubble up on slightly damp skin. The tingle-action of the bubbles really make it feel like the product is getting in there and doing its job. When I wiped it off, I tested it with a cotton pad and I could actually see how much it cleaned from my skin. So far this product is great!
customer_reviews.author: GumballWizard

customer_reviews.title: This is a really great mask!
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure this mask is just peroxide mixed with some other ingredients but it feels seriously good; it does an excellent job of cleaning my pores and giving my skin a radiant glow. My skin is a little sensitive and I did find the mask started to burn (just a little) after about 10 minutes but again, my skin is a little dry and sensitive from the long winter. I think this mask will be amazing in the summer, though.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Latreille

customer_reviews.title: Not for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I love elf and decided to give this mask a try. Unfortunately, I can't say it does much. My skin looks exactly the same after washing it off. It did not do anything for my pores or redness/inflammation. Instead it left my skin feeling stripped, which is common when I do purifying masks, since I have dry/sensitive skin, but other masks at least do something. However, it is not irritating and it is kind of entertaining to see the bubble foaming. This mask probably would be better for people with oily or combination skin, and whenever you want a fun, quick mask to do at sleepovers.
customer_reviews.author: AshEE

customer_reviews.title: Great product but dispensing part could be better
customer_reviews.text: Works well to get a nice deep clean. I love the tingling feeling that makes my skin feel refreshed. I have very oily and sensitive skin but after a month of using it I have had less breakouts and no issue with sensitivity. Only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is because I don’t care for how it dispenses. Whole top pushes down and comes out in the center of it. Seems like I use more than I would need and then I end up having to wipe off any excess so it won’t gum up the top. Otherwise another great product from e.l.f at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Idaho

customer_reviews.title: Fun but itchy, not easy to rinse off
customer_reviews.text: I like that this mask went from gel to bubble- pretty cool. Beyond that I have a couple dissatisfaction points. One, honestly this has been pretty itchy during the bubbling. It’s not like leaving a rash or anything but it’s almost hard to leave on sometimes bc I am frantic to scratch! Two, the application was patchy at times- could have been operator error there. And three, it wasn’t very easy to wash off- It left a bit of a gel coating.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: This elf cleansing mask is the best! I use it every night & it leaves ...
customer_reviews.text: This elf cleansing mask is the best! I use it every night & it leaves my face very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Gentle for Oily/Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: For Oily skin, we still need to hydrate! This stuff is gentle, so if you have sensitive skin like mine, this won't make you break out or clog your pores. Your skin feels light, soft, and refreshed!
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: First time I use it it work great and left my skin soft! I will order again !
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Marrero

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Packaging should be reconsidered
customer_reviews.text: I so far have loved this product. The bubbly mask really cleanses your skin and leaves it feeling smooth. I’ve been using it for five days and I can already tell the difference in my skin. I use it once a day or every other day and my skin has not dried out. I have bought the whole Elf line and I highly suggest their moisturizer after this mask. The packaging is awkward but I am sure it’s due to the fact that this liquid reacts to water and oxygen. I would like to see a better packaging system especially from this eco-friendly company.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Does not irritate skin.
customer_reviews.text: This mask works wonders. I had a few dark spots during pregnancy and didn’t go away after delivery. I used this for a few weeks and my skin is brighter than ever. It smells amazing too. It cleans out all my pores and leaves my face super bright. Also gets rid of old skin. Makeup looks fantastic after using this mask.
customer_reviews.author: Alvarezninneth

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles!
customer_reviews.text: This mask is amazing! I love the packaging, the amount of product & the price! This was my first bubble mask and it has completely impressed me! I used a tool to apply product. I loved the feeling of the mask working! I had a pimple beginning to come out last night and this morning it was almost gone & no longer sensitive to the touch! I didn’t feel like I used a lot and the product size is 50g! Go E.L.F!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life?!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!! Immediately after applying the product I knew this was going to be something wonderful. I felt the bubbles fizzing on my face reminding me of the times I get a facial. Because I have Roscea I was a little hesitant to try a new product because you never know how your skin will react. My skin loved this product!!! After using it for the first time I felt like I just walked out of the salon! This will be a staple in my beauty regime!!
customer_reviews.author: LNA

customer_reviews.title: Clean and moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Does it work? Leaves face feeling clean and moisturized. Didn't make ne break out like some other masks. Tingles from the bubbles drive me nuts, but I knew that going in. Have used about 10 times and still have some left.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Rose Norris

customer_reviews.title: Fun Mask
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter. She loves masks of all kinds and had been wanting to try a bubble mask. She loved it. It leaves your face feeling soft and clean. The bubbles kind of itch and tickle though.
customer_reviews.author: lovemykidz316

customer_reviews.title: What’s not to love about this product!
customer_reviews.text: Elf is everything, I mean this mask is so fun to use, really moisturizes, leaves skin really soft, extremely cheap and elf products are cruelty free! What’s not to love!
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Messy and Confusing
customer_reviews.text: I don't think this is doing anything for me plus, it's really messy. The product gets all over the container. There is also no good way to apply this evenly. As soon as you put a little bit on your face, it bubbles up immediately.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: First time using
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today and tried it for the first time so IDK how well it'll perform but it's feels nice. Easy to use. Tickles my face while on from the bubbles... Hehehe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Face feels soft
customer_reviews.text: I love what it does to my face, but if it gets into my eyes it itches like crazy... That's the one big disadvantage... Now I try to really watch it shouldn't get into my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Blima

customer_reviews.title: I've used the Milky Piggy carbonated mask before and liked it so much better
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit of a pain getting it out of the container. I've used the Milky Piggy carbonated mask before and liked it so much better. There's nothing bad about this one but just prefer the Milky Piggy one. It's a lot easier to get out and I just feel like my face is so much cleaner after
customer_reviews.author: JLR

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the texture and the way it bubbles, it feels good on my skin and once it is rinsed off my skin feels great!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Love this face wash
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Does a great job removing makeup and the day’dirt. Not harsh on my skin but keeps me beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Ann G. Rosas

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing mask ever
customer_reviews.text: I am one to never submit a review, but I love this product so much that I had to. The feeling of the mask is amazing not to mention like magic once u wash it off, ur skin feal so refresh. Recommend! Will make sure I re order again
customer_reviews.author: MariaG

customer_reviews.title: GREAT, slight bubbling Facewash!! Awesome e.l.f. again!
customer_reviews.text: This product does just what it says in the description! Feels great when you wash your face with it! Love my e.l.f products!
customer_reviews.author: Denise A

customer_reviews.title: Pamper time for me
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It feels amazing when the little bubbles tingle
customer_reviews.author: R. Begin

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: this was a gift and I think she liked them
customer_reviews.author: eliasbeth r.

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Didn't fizz all over my face. Only some parts. I applied it thick all over too. Left me feeling very dry so make sure you use a moisturizer!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this so much
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much! I have a combination face. Dry cheeks, oily nose. It makes you feel so clean
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clean Feeling
customer_reviews.text: It does tickle, as others have said. I liked it for days when I don't shower and want to wash my face. It leaves my face feeling clean and refreshed
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Great product that busted open in shipping
customer_reviews.text: Broke in travel. About half leaked out. Pretty bummed. Still a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun bubbles
customer_reviews.text: I’m not too sure how much it actually cleans but the bubbles are fun
customer_reviews.author: AReyOfSunshine

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for anyone with dry skin
customer_reviews.text: Loved this stuff. My skin feels amazing afterwards. It does everything the description says!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok.
customer_reviews.text: Meh..... not a huge fan. Definitely a cheap facial product.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Trapp

customer_reviews.title: Cannot go wrong with e.l.f. products!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product after shaving my face and it really hydrated and moisturized my skin! Wonderful mask!! Thank you e.l.f.!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Menzer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great skin care product! Get the exfoliation scrub to make it a complete set
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: So bubbly and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love this face mask! The bubbles make it so fun and entertaining to use. My skin felt so nice afterward and clean up wasn't terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Tabi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful face cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product makes my skin so smooth and soft without feeling greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cruelty Free LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask, makes my face feel fresh and soft! Highly recommend and it's cruelty free which is the BEST!
customer_reviews.author: ZoieBelle

customer_reviews.title: Great bubble mask
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask, it makes my skin super soft.
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, does not dry your skin out like most masks, skin feels dewy and refreshed after!
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and love e.l.f.! Leaves he face skin so smooth and hydrated. I use it twice a week! Recomend
customer_reviews.author: luiza

customer_reviews.title: Arrived perfect and on time
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these one for my daughter and one for myself. Arrived perfect and on time. Do recommend and will order again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great face mask
customer_reviews.text: Great product and leaves my skin feeling baby soft smooth
customer_reviews.author: Ashelv19

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Will purchase more love the way your face feels after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Calo

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Great product just hate how you got to pump out the product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fresh skin
customer_reviews.text: Use it as cleaner.leave my skin fresh after use.good to try
customer_reviews.author: Candychiu

customer_reviews.title: Expected bigger bubbles
customer_reviews.text: The bubbles don’t rise as much as I expected, but they foam slightly. Was a cool gift to my friend
customer_reviews.author: Erin Kiley

customer_reviews.title: Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I don't use this product but my daughter's love this bubble cleanser
customer_reviews.author: D21storm

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! Feels amazing, smells amazing! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Zach Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Try it :)
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great, but box was really broken upon delivery. For sure try it, feels really good! :)
customer_reviews.author: Teyon Clancy

customer_reviews.title: It comes out as a gel but as you put ...
customer_reviews.text: It comes out as a gel but as you put it on your face it starts to foam. It tickles very much and makes you want to scratch your face. Face feels smooth and fresh after use.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Paulsson

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!!! The only product that has kept my skin acne free and feels good while I'm washing it, not painful
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Great facial cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It’s a gentle facial cleanser that leaves my face feeling soft and refreshed!
customer_reviews.author: Anitra Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I think it's ok. Doesn't have that WOW factor for me. Would not repurchase this item.
customer_reviews.author: mirmir

customer_reviews.title: This mask makes my skin feel super nice. As a warning for anyone who has ...
customer_reviews.text: This mask makes my skin feel super nice. As a warning for anyone who has never used a bubble mask - it will itch like CRAZY while working. It's worth it though.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Yoder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This makes your skin feel so nice and refreshed and is fun!
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh Burley

customer_reviews.title: Send this to our military interrogators!
customer_reviews.text: Great product but beware! If you have that need to scratch an itch, any itch, be careful. The itch I describe is not like a mosquito or allergy itch. Think of hydrogen peroxide on a wound.. the fizzy bubbles? Ever need to scratch that itch? That is what you will feel on certain parts of your face!!! My husband physically restrained my hands because I wanted this to work... I screamed in hilarious horror to send this to American enemies as a torture device! My skin feels and looks clean and soft, works great but be warned
customer_reviews.author: Desere M

customer_reviews.title: It is fun to do with friends but it doesn't bubble as ...
customer_reviews.text: It is fun to do with friends but it doesn't bubble as much as I want it to and isn't very hydrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the bubbles
customer_reviews.text: I put it on for 6minutes. But I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing amount of "bubbles..."
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed in this product for the price. In store, elf is not a must buy for me for many items. The quality just isn't there. However, if tried several one time bubble masks from the selection at the store. I thought a whole jar would be great. I wanted to save $5 on a product that has enough YouTube tutorials to keep you occupied for a few days, I went the elf route. Just disappointing. My $2 bubble mask from Walmart was much more satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: K2-SO

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The bubbling tickles but its amazing and relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Shyanna zurn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! It starts to bubble immediately but nothing crazy and then disappears. You can definitely feel it working and as for black heads? What blackheads?? All gone! This is the onl product I've ever tried that actually gets rid of blackheads. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product!😍 Makes my face feel so good after!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Resort Skincare on a Motel Budget
customer_reviews.text: I truly didn't expect much for the price and because of the brand name, but I was pleasantly surprised. It leaves my skin incredibly soft and hydrated for a minimum of a week. I paired this with their skin care kit and exfoliating scrub and have seen major improvements with my skin. I would definitely recommend purchasing it. I've been using it since November and still have not run of out of product either.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: I like the mask very much
customer_reviews.text: I like the mask very much. Easy to rinse without leaving dried thick resido like other masks. Pleased with quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Fantastic! Leaves my skin clean and feeling fresh and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Petra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t tried it but it’s a big product I thought it was going to be smaller
customer_reviews.author: Alma

customer_reviews.title: Bubbly fun for your face
customer_reviews.text: This is not only fun to watch work, but my face always feels great after I rinse.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsy

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is just lovely. It's fun to use (hello, tickling bubbles) and left my skin feeling soft and moisturized. The bottle itself is a little underwhelming, as the top that you squish to gather the product gets stuck from time to time, but other than that, it's a great, affordable face cleanser mask thingy.
customer_reviews.author: Shellee Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So fun to use! The tingling bubbly effect is awesome, and my skin feels great after.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The thing stops working even though there is still alot left in.
customer_reviews.author: Charla Morgan

customer_reviews.title: No bubbles
customer_reviews.text: It foams up less than an average soap so its so not a bubble cleanser
customer_reviews.author: Antonia Valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: ... it on and it rllllllly hurts so I wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: It burns my eyes when I put it on and it rllllllly hurts so I wouldn't recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very fun at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask, the pump from the top makes this very sanitary and I used it at a girls night and we all loved it. My favorite way to apply is with those flat foundation brushes (which I never use for foundation because the shape is way too awkward for blending) but that works wonderful with this gel like mask. Do I notice any life-changing thing about my skin after? No. But I never have a mask that has done that. After it feels more moisturized, and it's fun! So that's good enough for me. My skin is also more on the sensitive side and this doesn't bother me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Will keep this stocked in my arsenal of facial products!
customer_reviews.text: This mask is great! Different from anything I've tried before (first time trying a bubble mask) so far I love it. It tingles and makes me want to itch my face but it is like a little massage. It took a few pumps to get the jar to dispense some of the liquid but after that it worked fine. I also used a cotton pad to wipe off and was surprised to get some visible dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita

customer_reviews.title: Overall great mask, be careful if you have sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Product is great quality and has a light nice scent, be very careful if you have sensitive skin. It’s my fault for not taking this in consideration before using, so I still give it a 5 star review. I have rosacea and it did irritate my skin on the parts of my face affected by it but was not bad. My mom used it no issues. Fun mask and definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pump on product was broken upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: I am returning the product because the pump arrived broken and I barely tried any product. The little amount of product that came out did bubble and foam up on my face, however it left a sticky residue that I had to use facial cleanser to remove the sticky feeling. I would not buy this again because I did not like how my face felt after using the mask.
customer_reviews.author: SarahMonroe

customer_reviews.title: Foam Face
customer_reviews.text: Love how it feels on my face... Foaming bubbles leave you feeling refreshed and clean!
customer_reviews.author: FunnyBunny

customer_reviews.title: Veru little product.
customer_reviews.text: Product is great BUT is only good for maybe 3 uses ... kind of dissapointed 😑 Ps. And I used a small amount each time.
customer_reviews.author: Selene Guillo

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these at first at Walmart. Elf is a great penny-pincher brand and I figured I could find it cheaper on Amazon. Can’t beat the price especially when the 1x use masks run to be about $2 to $4
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not hydrating, but gets skin super clean
customer_reviews.text: I like how efficient it is at helping to remove make up, but I wouldn't call it hydrating which is what I was really hoping for. I expected more "bubbling" for a bubble mask.
customer_reviews.author: Liz the casual user

customer_reviews.title: It works! Needs a different design for the bottle
customer_reviews.text: This product works great, very smooth and healthy looking. The only reason I didnt give 5 stars is the pump portion of this is kinda cranky and hard to use especially when your hands are wet. But the formula is amazing! I have dry and oily skin and it work on both very well
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany S

customer_reviews.title: Not so sure yet
customer_reviews.text: Just used it tonight for the first time. I use a lot of different things on my aging skin so I wanted to give this a try. It tingled so much that I couldn’t wait to wash it off. After my skin looked dry... I applied a moisturizer right away... time will tell if this helps clean your pores.
customer_reviews.author: TonyT

customer_reviews.title: Leaves skin feeling smooth
customer_reviews.text: The bubbles definitely tickle, it can take a lot of will to not scratch at your face to stop the tickle haha. Once rinsed clean, it leaves your skin feeling clean and smooth. Not sure how long the container will last, but it didn't seem like much was required for one use.
customer_reviews.author: CBJB

customer_reviews.title: Fun Bubble Mask!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been dying for a bubble mask. The e.l.f Bubble Cleansing Mask goes on great and gets super bubbly. Its so fun to use and leaves our skin feeling amazing. Will definitely reorder when time.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Blackmer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This face mask was perfect for when u are trying to relax in the tub. It’s so relaxing to use. Definitely recommend to anyone who loves getting in the tub and having a nice relaxing bath.
customer_reviews.author: David Harder

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. ! It gives a nice, subtle tingly feeling when it starts bubbling. Afterwards, my skin felt and looked amazing! I've been dealing with dry skin on my face for a while now and this bubble mask has made a difference!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Pelcic

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Bubbling feels weird. Actually makes me skin feel like its itching. Not super moisturizing like I’d hoped
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: Poor lid design
customer_reviews.text: Moisturizes but the lid design needs help. The product dries in the dispenser and clogs it up after the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Bugley

customer_reviews.title: Feels great on my skin
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing and so inexpensive. I pay more for other items that are just ok. I love how this feels and works.
customer_reviews.author: dzyn4u

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles weren’t as big
customer_reviews.text: This is a great facemask I was expecting the bubbles to be bigger on my face but otherwise it’s great
customer_reviews.author: couponer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic line of products!
customer_reviews.text: You simply can't go wrong with E.L.F. products. Face is super clean
customer_reviews.author: Red 72 GTO

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I have like half oily skin & half dry & it made my face SUPER DRY. I literally used it twice & threw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Itzel W

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but maybe doesn't do much
customer_reviews.text: Super fun and bubbly, didn't hurt my sensitive skin, but I don't know that it really helped it either. Really fun for a spa night though.
customer_reviews.author: fraulie

customer_reviews.title: The answer to erasing a dull complexion!
customer_reviews.text: Great effective product. The bubbles tickle my skin, but other than that, its a great product. The answer to erasing a dull complexion and emerging with softer, radiant skin.
customer_reviews.author: Blissquarian

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I adore this product!! Its so moisturizing!! I tried getting another bottle but they are sold out so I will be heading to their store!
customer_reviews.author: Everything Feesa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well - like the tingle as the bubbles go
customer_reviews.author: KaeriD

customer_reviews.title: Nice bubble mask
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun little mask, the bubbles tickle and my face feels clean when I'm done. I use a silicone scrubber for some exfoliation and I'm good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Sachse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fun to use, as it bubbles up on your face. This leaves my face feeling very clean and soft.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl blonstein

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's okay, but there isn't anything spectacular about this product. Probably wouldn't repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Can't really see any "mask" benefit to this product. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Alderson

product_meta.title: e.l.f. Cosmetics Hydrating Bubble Mask for Cleansing and Moisturizing Your Skin, 1.69 Ounce Jar
product_meta.description: The Hydrating Bubble Mask is your secret weapon to a flawless face. 2017 Essence Best in Black Beauty Award Winner. Say goodbye to clogged pores and dirt build-up. This mask works hard to remove impurities without being harsh on your skin; leaving it refreshed and hydrated. Follow up with your favorite moisturizer for soft skin and total hydration. e.l.f. makes the best of beauty accessible to every eye, lip, and face. Your originality is infinite, and we are inspired by what makes you unique. From the early explorer to the trend-obsessed beauty junkie—glam or bare faced, minimalist, maximalist and every look in between—we are for every eye, lip, and face. Proud to be 100% vegan and cruelty-free, worldwide.
feature_bullets: CLEANSES AND REVITALIZES Our bubbling facemask cleanses and hydrates your skin with thousands of tiny bubbles that gently wash away dirt and clear out pores, leaving your skin with a hydrated glow.
GET GLOWING, HEALTHY SKIN With deep cleaning bubbles, these face masks help give your skin a healthy, hydrated glow.

HOW TO USE Push down on sides of top to dispense product and apply thin layer to damp skin. Allow mask to sit on skin for 5-10 minutes until bubbles begin to dissipate. Massage face with fingertips and wash with warm water to remove. Pat dry.

AT e.l.f. COSMETICS, we believe that beauty comes from within all of us, and our products are designed to let your inner beauty shine through. We offer luxurious cosmetics made with quality ingredients that are perfect for women of any age.
CRUELTY FREE AND VEGAN Our cosmetics are PETA certified cruelty free and vegan, so you can feel good about using our products.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
